ygData.subject: New Enchanter Forum
ygData.msgSnippet: While I have a list of forums that have a lot of useful info, it s a bit difficult, as an enchanter, to find relavent bits, especially considering it s
ygData.messageBody:
While I have a list of forums that have a lot of useful info, it's a bit difficult,
as an enchanter, to find relavent bits, especially considering it's originally
rogue based...

I searched high and low for a decent EZBoard enchanter forum, and could find
none..

First, if anyone knows of one (I know there are non-ezboard ones, like castersrealm,
etc, but they have various problems, the main one being they are all blocked
by my firewall. ;) ), please let me know...


Otherwise, in an attempt to fill this void, I've started a basic forum to do
this.

http://pub28.ezboard.com/bhallsofillusion

It is entirely default ATM, if a few people start visiting it, I'll add a bit,
and if it looks useful, I'll go all out. I think that info will still show
up here and other places (and should, as I have kept up on the other classes
quests because it's both useful info, interesting, and sometimes information
from quests mix together), but if we could have a place more specific to enchanters,
instead of feeding off the few relevant posts on sites not dedicated to the
class, it would be helpful.

Again, we'll see where it goes... if nothing else, I have quiet a bit of knowledge
about EQ, enchanters, and a few other things, so could at least share info with
a few people if it doesn't take off. :) Or learn something myself...

For now, the biggest issue is obviously this quest.. I'm going to post what
I've learned from scouring various sites (which is one reason I did this...
there was no site that has all this info on it, in one place) there soon...
it'll be a good spot, for now, to find all relevant known info.

*shrug* We'll see.

Hope to see a few of you there.
